title: Wildcats and white horses
brief_description: The search for oil under the sea in Bass Strait, showing preliminary survey methods, then test drilling, with a detailed account of the operation of the floating rig Glomar III, and the successful well Marlin A-one.
description: The search for oil under the sea in Bass Strait, showing preliminary survey methods, then test drilling, with a detailed account of the operation of the floating rig Glomar III, and the successful well Marlin A-one.
